articles.title: GRAINS-Chicago soybeans set for weekly drop; dry weather in focus
articles.description: (Adds details, quotes; updates prices)By Matthew ChyeSINGAPORE, March 3 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures struggled to find direction on Friday, but were poised for weekly losses, despite some support from concerns about supply from top producer Argentina amid dry weather conditions.Wheat edged lower, while corn held steady.

articles.title: Soybeans up 6¢ | Friday, March 3, 2023
articles.description: Traders expect private estimates of Argentina soybean production to be reduced ahead of USDA report, analyst says.
articles.content:
Corn is currently down 1⁄ 2 of a penny while soybeans are up 6¢.
CBOT wheat is up 2¢. KC wheat is up 4¢. Minneapolis wheat is up 2¢.
